languages.text: {n}Ульфар сумрачно прищуривается.{/n} "Ты на что-то намекаешь? Подозреваешь, что плен развратил и отравил меня пагубной тягой к плоти?" {n}Верхняя губа гиганта задирается, демонстрируя жуткие зубы.{/n} "Не зли волка".

{n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар сумрачно прищуривается.{/n} "Ты на что-то намекаешь? Подозреваешь, что плен развратил и отравил меня пагубной тягой к плоти?" {n}Верхняя губа гиганта задирается, демонстрируя жуткие зубы.{/n} "Не зли волка".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法眯起了眼睛，死死地盯着你。{/n}“你想说什么？你以为把我关在囚笼里，就足以让我堕落，让我产生渴望血肉的肮脏欲望吗？”{n}这位壮硕的星际战士微微翘起了上唇，露出了可怕的尖牙。{/n}“不要激怒老狼。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法眯起了眼睛，死死地盯着你。{/n}“你想说什么？你以为把我关在囚笼里，就足以让我堕落，让我产生渴望血肉的肮脏欲望吗？”{n}这位壮硕的星际战士微微翘起了上唇，露出了可怕的尖牙。{/n}“不要激怒老狼。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué insinúa? ¿Cree que haber sido prisionero me ha corrompido, sembrando en mi interior un ansia inmunda de carne?». {n}El enorme Marine Espacial te enseña su aterradora dentadura.{/n} «No provoque al lobo».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué insinúa? ¿Cree que haber sido prisionero me ha corrompido, sembrando en mi interior un ansia inmunda de carne?». {n}El enorme Marine Espacial te enseña su aterradora dentadura.{/n} «No provoque al lobo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは目を細め、にらみつけた。{/n}「何を言いたいんだ？囚われの身となったことで、俺は堕落し、肉への汚らわしい憧れを抱くようになったとでも？」{n}巨大なスペースマリーンは上唇を丸め、恐ろしい歯を見せる。{/n}「オオカミを挑発するな」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは目を細め、にらみつけた。{/n}「何を言いたいんだ？囚われの身となったことで、俺は堕落し、肉への汚らわしい憧れを抱くようになったとでも？」{n}巨大なスペースマリーンは上唇を丸め、恐ろしい歯を見せる。{/n}「オオカミを挑発するな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar kneift bedrohlich die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was soll das heißen? Glaubt Ihr, meine Gefangenschaft hat mich verdorben und in mir schändliche Gelüste nach Fleisch geweckt?" {n}Der riesige Space Marine zieht die Oberlippe hoch und gibt den Blick auf seine furchterregenden Zähne frei.{/n} "Provoziert den Wolf nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar kneift bedrohlich die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was soll das heißen? Glaubt Ihr, meine Gefangenschaft hat mich verdorben und in mir schändliche Gelüste nach Fleisch geweckt?" {n}Der riesige Space Marine zieht die Oberlippe hoch und gibt den Blick auf seine furchterregenden Zähne frei.{/n} "Provoziert den Wolf nicht."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar plisse les yeux, et son regard se fait menaçant.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous sous-entendez ? Vous pensez que le fait d'avoir été captif m'a corrompu et a éveillé en moi un appétit funeste pour la chair ? » {n}La lèvre supérieure du gigantesque Space Marine se retrousse, révélant ses impressionnantes dents.{/n} « Ne provoquez pas le loup. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

Vous pensez que le fait d'avoir été captif m'a corrompu et a éveillé en moi un appétit funeste pour la chair ? » {n}La lèvre supérieure du gigantesque Space Marine se retrousse, révélant ses impressionnantes dents.{/n} « Ne provoquez pas le loup. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, gözlerini kısıp sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Ne demek istiyorsun? Mahkûm olmanın beni yozlaştırdığını ve içimde ete karşı iğrenç bir tutkuyu uyandırdığını mı söylemeye çalışıyorsun?" {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi'nin üst dudağı kıvrılarak iğrenç dişlerini ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kurdu uyandırma."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar narrows his eyes, glowering.{/n} "What are you suggesting? Do you think that being a prisoner has corrupted me and sown within me a foul yearning for flesh?" {n}The giant Space Marine's upper lip curls, revealing his terrifying teeth.{/n} "Do not provoke the wolf."

Mahkûm olmanın beni yozlaştırdığını ve içimde ete karşı iğrenç bir tutkuyu uyandırdığını mı söylemeye çalışıyorsun?" {n}Devasa Uzay Piyadesi'nin üst dudağı kıvrılarak iğrenç dişlerini ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kurdu uyandırma."
